resources.string: This app will show you horror movie characters and their famous songs!

Halloween (1978)
Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution and returns to his hometown to terrorize teens on Halloween night.
A slasher classic directed by John Carpenter.

Friday the 13th (1980)
Camp Crystal Lake reopens despite its dark history.
Camp counselors begin dying mysteriously in this iconic horror franchise.

The Thing (1982)
At a remote Antarctic base, a shape-shifting alien creature turns everyone against each other.
A paranoid and claustrophobic thriller directed by John Carpenter.

Nightmare on Elm Street (1984)
Teenagers are hunted in their dreams by Freddy Krueger, a killer with bladed gloves.
If you fall asleep, the nightmare becomes deadly.

Scream (1996)
A masked killer begins murdering teens in a small town, playing with the rules of horror movies.
A mix of suspense, self-awareness, and dark humor.
